Phobia considered the possabilities for a moment, the only problem he 
could see was that sooner or later this new bot would grow tired of 
sharing power and turn on him. "You offer a great deal to me, but I 
only act as leader while KitKat recovers." He thought about the 
advantages "Out of curiosity though what would you plan for Megatron?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
> "I am sorry. Now I have a Proposal for you. I am assuming you are 
the leader 
> so I'll ask you. If you wish, you and I may lead these Preadacons 
equally. I 
> will be able to help you in getting revenge on whoever has done 
this."
